name: calls.participants.add
desc: Registers new participants added to a Call.

id.desc: id returned by the calls.add method.

users.desc: The list of users to add as participants in the Call. Read more on how to specify users here.

errors.bad_users: At least one specified user is already part of the Call.
errors.inactive_call: The Call has been already ended.
errors.internal_error: An unexpected exception occurred while adding a Call participant.
errors.user_not_found: At least one specified user wasn't found.
